page.title: 10EVENTS IN BRAMSHAW AREA
page.content: {ORGANISED LOCALLY} 1MINI MARATHON organised by the village postmaster in aid of local magazine, first run in 198O. 2 BARREL RACE from Royal Oak pub Fritham across Forest terrain to Sir Walter Tyrell pub Brook. 3 CHURCH FETE & SOCIAL CLUB FUNCTIONS. 4 CATTLE & PONY DRIFTS. Both a working & social event. Function to round up livestock for branding or selling. Pony drifts are exciting events with locals helping both on foot & on horeback. Commoners running stock on the Forest are expected to help. {ORGANISED ELSEWHERE} 1 Orienteering competitions. 2 Long distance horse & pony endurance rides. 3 Several day concourse for horse drawn carriages.
